transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Very good morning sir, from Patan Steel se baat kar rahe hai.
Customer: Kaun baat kar raha hai?
Executive: Hi sir good morning actually main Naveen baat kar raha tha IndiaMART ke office Noida se kaise hai sir?
Customer: Barabar hai bataiye barabar hai aap apne barabar hi call lete hai.
Executive: Hi sir actually sir aap se mera discussion Friday ko hua tha sir jo refund ke regarding aap connect kar rahe hain shayad Riyaz sir se bhi aapki baat hui thi sir us din unhone bhi aapko call kiya tha.
Customer: Kisne baat ki?
Executive: Riyaz ul Haq sir yaha pe senior hai shayad unse bhi aapki Friday ko baat hui thi right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Yes unhone bhi aapko call kiya tha unse bhi aapka discussion hua hoga correct?
Customer: Nahi jo jo baat hui hai wo to aapke paas recording hota hai isliye mujhe wo repeat karne ki zarurat nahi hai to kya discussion mein kya aaya hai refund aaj ho jayega kal ho jayega wo bataiye.
Executive: Bilkul sir usi pe aa raha hu sir actually kaafi multiple discussion hamare hue hai sir iske bihaf pe aur ye ek final call hai sir main aapse finally is bare mein baat karna chahta tha ki aapne agar isko band karane ka decision liya hi hai sir theek hai bilkul.
Executive: Haan matlab wo bhi karta hu sir agar aap chah rahe hain service nahi use karna hai to ye aapka final decision hai to I think main aapka feedback aage share kar raha hu ki aap apna account close karana chahte hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi main main ye yes bol raha hu aap suniye main abhi abhi aapko ye ye de raha hu maine already saari product deactivate kar di hai saari saare detail bhi usme se delete kar diye hai app se aur main do teen cheeze jaise mera email address hai aur mera phone number hai wo sab bhi main delete kar leta hu jaise hi wo aa jayega mera refund to sab main nikalne wala hu.
Executive: Hmm hmm hmm.
Customer: To mera final hai kya kya aap mera account close karne se pehle ya close hone ke baad turant aap refund kar dijiye main objection de raha hu.
Executive: Hmm boliye bataiye bataiye sir.
Customer: Haan kitna hota hai pehle ye bataiye sabse pehle ye mera jo hai kyuki mujhe che mahine se to mera problem chal raha hai isliye mujhe malum hai aap logo ko che mahine ka to wo dene wale nahi hai wo to chala gaya mera.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Waise us samay to jab hamara discussion ho raha tha sir usi ki main to aapko convince kar raha tha kyuki IndiaMART aisa nahi hai sir aap abhi chala rahe hai aapka pehle se chala rahe hai aur acche se jante hai aap IndiaMART ko.
Customer: Dekhiye aap aap log sab positive hai lekin work positive nahi hua iske liye ye sab karna pada positive hone se positive work ho jata hai ye zaruri nahi hai mera jo main mera jo main discussion ka ye hai ki agar koi bhi cheez ko che mahina lagta hai to wo uska band kar dena chahiye mere hisab se jo service nahi de pa rahe hai uska che mahina hai che mahine se kaun discuss karta hai kiske paas itna time hota hai che che mahine mera fail jaye aur aur aap ye keh rahe hai ki hum log service dena chahte hai dena to de nahi rahe na uska kya matlab agar ho nahi raha hai aap aapke paas se kuch sahi nahi ho raha hai to iska matlab ye hai kahi na kahi aap fail ho rahe ho service dene mein agar fail ho rahe ho to aapko aapko apni jawabdari samajh ke liability ko samajh ke waha se ginti karna chahiye jaha se aap fail hue hai to fir bhi hamara che mahina gaya mera to che mahina jayega main fir bhi maine message mein likh diya hai ki agar mera che mahine ka aap loss karna chahte ho karo main aapke aapke upar depend kar deta hu baki ke jo bhi mera last jaha tak bachta hai wo kitna amount hota hai pehle mujhe aap ye batao uske baad jo banta hai amount wo kab aayega do do hi prashn hai kitna mera amount abhi bachta hai aur kab kab mujhe wo milega mere account mein.
Executive: Dekhiye ek ek ek cheez to main aapko clear kar raha hu kyuki IndiaMART aap 2017 se chala rahe hain aap har ek cheez jante hain aapne basic service chalaai MDC fir aapne upgrade kiya maximizer mein aapne beech mein export bhi service hamari try ki fir aapne band kar diya to ek cheez to dekhiye clear hai sir aap chahte to the IndiaMART pe aana sir mujhe nahi pata kya reason hai kis wajah se aap itna is account ko close karne pe lage hue hain sir kyuki aap bhi jante hain sir kyuki market mein baithna bahut zaruri hai online presence hona bahut zaruri hai sir Patan Steel ko log acche se jante hain aapka naam ek market mein bana hua hai sir aap isko band karenge wo decision totally aapka hai I agree lekin ye cheez samajhiyega sir isko band karne ke baad aapka jo presence hai sir IndiaMART pe wo bhi band hoga sir.
Customer: Main sab kuch sab kuch janta hu isliye main bada che mahine kyu wait kiya maine ye bataiye kyuki che mahine se aapke sath discussion kiya maine karna chahta to che mahine pehle bhi maine ek baar bola hi tha ek mahine ke dedh mahine ke baad aap aap shayad Aminash ji se puch sakte hai ki bhai aap service nahi de pa rahe hai to aap kaam karo mera account close kar do lekin fir bhi unhone aap bhi aap bhi unki jante ho ki naya platform hai aap bhi baat khatam nahi hui aap bhi unki jante ho ki kaun si online platform ho suniye bhi sir XYZ IndiaMART ke alawa suniye sir meri baat khatam nahi hui thi aapne beech mein apna apna wo baat chalu kar di main ye keh raha tha agar che mahine se main ye discussion kar raha hu ek dedh mahine ke baad maine foran wo ye sab chalu kar diya discussion hona ki bhai mujhe aapko ye proper meri jo product hai uske relevant mujhe inquiry ya buylead nahi aa rahi hai to aap waha se kuch karo Aminash ji ne apne manage se kuch kiya aur kuch time matlab 15 20 din badhiya chala fir wo disturb ho gaya matlab kya ho raha hai kyu ho raha hai aisa to maine unko feedback bhi diya tha ki bhai nahi abhi accha chalne lag raha hai fir uske baad fir disturb hua to kis wajah se hua kuch program mein changes hai kuch mere mere jo chal rahi hai meri jo site website ya fir mera jo promotion chal raha hai waha kuch problem hai technically wo aapne solve nahi kiya solve mere par aap aap blame blame karte rahe ye nahi kar rahe wo nahi kar rahe ye karna hai wo karna hai.
Executive: Blame ki baat nahi hai sir yaha pe aapne do issue raise kiya jo process IndiaMART pe chal raha hai wahi same as it is maine bataya sold out ek hi gaya sir sold out sheet jo hoti hai wo process hai sir uske liye sir aap entrepreneur unke paas se.
Customer: Are maine usko aaj koi bhi option nahi hota ya isliye usko chhod dijiye main puri service ki baat kar raha hu main puri service ki baat kar raha hu ki jaha tak mujhe wo service jis type ki milni chahiye wo nahi mil rahi hai to mujhe nahi chahiye aisi service jisme main mera position ho yaani ki mera sar dard ho to main nahi chahta isliye main exit hona chahta hu.
Executive: Main aapki samajh sakta hu sir agar agar maan lijiye main aapki baat maan leta hu mujhe ek cheez samajhna hai sir kya aap IndiaMART pe dobara aana chahenge aur bataiye mujhe mujhe nahi mujhe nahi rehna hai sir aap please.
Executive: Nahi sir please main aapki baat maan leta hu lekin suppose.
Customer: Nahi discuss nahi karna iske bare mein.
Executive: Aisa nahi ho sakta sir thoda sir kabhi aage aap kabhi IndiaMART jaise band karke fir se aap chahte ho ki che mahine baad main fir se aaunga aisa to nahi hai.
Customer: Main sochunga iske bare mein maine ye bhi bataya tha ki agar mujhe laga ki bhai nayi tarike se judne se kuch fayda hoga to karenge kuch aage wo wo in future ki baat hai.
Executive: Nahi wo main wahi samajhna chahta tha aisa to nahi hai sir ki aap soch rahe ho ki abhi abhi band kar dete hain aur che mahine baad theek lagega dobara aa jayenge.
Customer: Aisa to nahi ho raha sir ye ye ye maine ye maine apna nirnay bataya nahi hai isliye aap aap mere par mat thopiye isko.
Executive: Hmm hmm main wo main clear karna chahta tha agar aisa hai sir to uska bhi solution hai mere paas agar aap ye soch rahe ho ki thode din baad dekhte hain baad mein naya banayenge account to ye account to waise purana hai sir 2017 se chal raha hai to agar maan lijiye isko band karke aap naya account bhi banana chahte hain to usse bhi main main aapko kuch cheeze bata sakta hu isliye main ye puch raha hu agar aap kya solution hai bata sakte hai kya solution hai aapke paas bataiye ek minute do minute mein short mein bata dijiye.
Executive: Wahi main keh raha hu dekhiye agar aap isko band karke naya account open karna chahte hain sir to wo bhi main aapko batata hu aapne product dekhiye out of stock kar diye inactive kar diye theek hai aur agar aap naye tarike se koi naya account leke aayenge to obviously sir wo zero se start hoga product add honge fir uski listing aayegi wo saari cheeze zero se start hongi ye jo account hai ye 2017 se chal raha hai sir matlab aath saal ho chuke hain is account ko to iski iski value hai sir abhi is account ki purane hone ki wajah se aap agar isko band karenge aur naye karaenge sir to fir aapko fir zero se apni listing start karni padegi aur zero se apna naam banana padega bas yahi main samajhna chahta tha agar aisa hai aapke mind mein.
Customer: Wo abhi maine kuch uske bare mein nahi socha hai ye to Aminash ji se meri jo last mein baat hui na to maine aisa unko khali ek ek friend as a friend bata diya ki agar mujhe laga ki che aath mahine saal mein agar mujhe laga ki mujhe IndiaMART se judna chahiye to us time sochenge aisa khali bas itna ek friend as a friend bataya tha aur mujhe nahi lagta hai ki main shayad jud paunga next time lekin ek ek khali soch rakhi hai khali.
Executive: Samajh gaya theek hai to Sura sir ek kaam karta hu short karte hain isko main request aapki dal raha hu yaha pe aapki service band karne ki theek hai aur jaise hi confirmation mil raha hai main aapko call karke inform karta hu main aapka request yaha pe raise kar raha hu sir request mera amount to dekh lijiye kitna banta hai mujhe pehle wo janna hai.
Executive: Thoda sir amount jo banega sir jaise refund jab hum initiate karte hain to prorata basis pe aapka jitni din service chali hoti hai uske base pe wo refund banta hai jaise hi wo amount aayega main aapko share kar dunga sir whatsapp pe.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Maine band kar diya hai already maine maine to sab deactivate kar diya hai ab bolo to.
Executive: Haan wo dekh liya maine wo dekh liya sir aapne deactivate kiya hai dikh gaya mujhe.
Customer: Haan wo waise bhi wahi main aapka aapke jo Riyaz ul Haq the unhone to kuch mujhe challenge diya tha main wo ravivar tak tha maine to shukrawar ko wo challenge pura kar diya.
Executive: Nahi aisa nahi dekhiye sir wo sab log chahte hain ki aap account chalaye aur IndiaMART pe rahe hume bhi aap account apna band kare.
Customer: Are bhai sab main manta hu bilkul aap aapki hamare sath judi hui hai aap aap aap logo ki lagani hamare sath judi hui hai lekin kuch hote hai kuch decision aise hote hai jo lena padta hai.
Executive: Samajh raha hu main dekhiye sir decision aapka hai sir kahi pe hum kisi cheez se matlab hum to chahenge account chale but agar aapko lag raha hai aap santusht nahi hai service se to koi baat nahi main aapka ye refund ka jo request hai usko main aage badha raha hu theek hai aur jaise hi refund amount aata hai main whatsapp karta hu aapko.
Customer: Haan ji ji bilkul kar dijiye theek hai jitni jaldi ho sake mujhe.
Executive: Theek hai thoda sir wait form bataiye to main aapki request aage forward kar raha hu sir.
Customer: Bilkul mera account close karke mujhe refund ki aap process kar dijiye main fir se ye bol raha hu.
Executive: Theek hai sir definitely definitely sir main karta hu.
Customer: Okay okay theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund processed immediately.

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART service.

- Claims 6 months of unresolved issues.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to process account closure.

- Executive will forward refund request.

- Refund amount to be shared via WhatsApp.



Next Steps: 

- Executive to share refund amount via WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account closure, service issues, deactivation
